response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to you at $1,000,000. I understand its importance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering the exceptional quality and the significant benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $950,000 for it. This price not only ensures a substantial return for us but also leaves room for negotiation if necessary. I believe this is a fair deal that respects the value you place on this product while maximizing our earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
